name: Inflatabrawl
description:
Requires at least 1 controller to play

Inflatabrawl is a fast paced local multiplayer action game where you play as customizable balloons and pick up a lot of wacky weaponry to either, pop your opponents and be the last balloon floating, or pop yourself by accident because you tried to throw a pickaxe and thought everything will be fine.

if you do not have a controller (and a friend) and you're still curious then you can press F1 to load the map in debug mode.

this was an experiment for me to see how many things I can cram into a project made in a game engine I've never used before (in this case unity). turns out not a whole lot but it was a fun experience.

Controls (Keyboard):

Movement - WASD

Jumping - J

Weapon Shoot - K

Weapon Drop - L

Controls (Xinput Controller):

Movement - D-Pad

Jumping - A

Weapon Shoot - X

Weapon Drop - B/Y
